cast.name: 雅各布·盖尔沙乌 Jakub Gierszal
伊格纳西·利斯 Ignacy Liss

director.name: 格里戈维奇·莫德勒 Grzegorz Mołda

introduction: "Zadra" is a talented girl from a housing estate who fights for recognition on the rap scene. Although she seems to be an ordinary teenager, in front of the microphone, she gains incredible energy and charisma, thanks to which she can captivate crowds. However, in a testosterone-rich environment, it's hard to find a place for people like her. "Zadra" fights for dreams, but most of all for a better tomorrow for his family. Despite this, music is not everything, because love will have a key influence on the main character's life.
